There’s no spend to waste

Accelerate your recovery with SAP Concur solutions.

How Better Spend Management Drives Better Decisions
Get started	Solutions	Features	For your team
It’s time to fully digitize how you control costs
Digitize

“The benefits of SAP Concur to Oxfam is the greater transparency of expense data, and staff have really embraced it. Now they’re on time with about 95% completion on-time.”

David Gunn
Financial Controller
Oxfam

Integrate

“With minimal training, it’s now clear to employees what their responsibility is and that’s resulted in a complete change in staff, manager and company behaviour.”

TV Satheesan
Business Systems Manager
rhipe

Accelerate

“We’ve had significant growth in our business in the last five years. We couldn’t have scaled effectively or achieved the level of spending control and compliance we have without SAP Concur.”

Simone Fitzpatrick
Accounting Operations Manager
Nespresso

Make the right choice. We’ll show you how.

Fully digitizing your spend management processes is easier than you may think. Take the next step in your digital transformation journey:

Explore our #1-rated spend management solutions
Evaluate our platform against your business requirements
Demo our solutions and calculate your ROI
Talk with our solutions experts about integration options

See expense demo Calculate your ROI

See spend. Control costs. Reduce risk.

Simplify your expense process and make life easier for employees.

See spend
Concur Travel

Take the complexity out of sustainable travel management and compliance.

Control costs
Concur Invoice

Reduce risk
One cloud-based solution that scales with your business
Business Intelligence

Make decisions and drive change with data that matters most.

Intelligence T&E today

Over 200 ERP, CRM, and HR integration partners

Make faster, better informed business decisions by integrating your SAP Concur spend data across your existing technology ecosystem.

Integrations Custom reports

Mobile, cloud-based tools employees will use and love

Increase employee productivity, engagement, and compliance with powerful cloud-based tools, such as the SAP Concur mobile app.

Mobile apps EX benefits

Expert 24/7 support and online education centre

Get the insights you need with our 24/7 User Support Desk, online community and training resources, and dedicated Customer Success Team.

Support resources Community

Choosing the right partner is a group decision

We have the answers each member of your team needs

Finance leaders

Take control of costs and proactively manage risks — as spending habits and processes change.

Answers for finance

Answers for IT

Answers for HR
